content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 1 anti-aircraft missile complex and 13 areas of focus of the enemy's personnel.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

"The departments of missile troops have defeated 6 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment of the enemy, 8 artillery systems, 1 anti -tank agent and 1 jet system of volley fire", - the message reads.

Recall, occupiersThey stormNovopavlovsky direction: the Armed Forces reflected 18 attacks.

As reported by the Armyinform, in March 2024 the forces of Ukraine's defense forcesdestroyed 976 Russian artillery systems.
title: Our aircraft has struck 14 strokes on the SCR and the enemy's positions
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. “The missile troops were inflicted ...
author: Army Inform
